means: 百人队长，百夫长（古罗马的军官，指挥百人）

sentence.Network_en: When Jesus had entered Capernaum, a centurion came to him, asking for help.
sentence.Network_cn: 耶稣进了迦百农，有一个百夫长前来求助。

sentence.Network_en: Disciples and centurion recognized Jesus is the Son of God.
sentence.Network_cn: 当时代的人(门徒和百夫长)认耶稣是神子、是神.

sentence.Network_en: The centurion and servant did not see Jesus this day.
sentence.Network_cn: 百夫长和仆人当天?看过耶稣.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Latin centurio(n-), from centuria (see century)

entry.tran: (古罗马军团的)百人队队长，百夫长
entry.def: A centurion was an officer in the Roman army.
